summary:
A HIGH Realistic ENB, with much Performance and Mod-Recommendations, for the ultimate REAL Skyrim Experience! Including ENBoost.



BASIC Installation should not take longer than 5 minutes
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=orange][font=distant galaxy][size=3]This ENB, and my Mod-Suggestions are intended to make Skyrim as Real and Immersive as possible. ENBs are working with Textures,that means if Textures are better, ENB is better, too. In conjunction with Ewi65 ini-settings, under my optional section, you´ll get a Mass Performance Boost.[/size][/font]



[color=red][u][size=6pt]Real doesn`t mean Beautiful. It just means Real.[/size][/u][/color][u]




[color=orange][size=6][b]Intended to use in Conjunction with:[/b][/size][/color][/u][/color]


[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img443/5638/logoncb.png[/img]
[color=orange][font=impact][size=6][b][u]and[/u][/b][/size][/font][/color]

[img]http://fabioemerick.files.wordpress.com/2013/08/logo91.jpg[/img]



[color=orange][size=3pt]And here is a short Preview of my ENB and how it should look like:[/size][/color]
[size=2pt][color=red](Please watch in Full HD, to get the best impression, that Youtube can offer)[/color][/size]

[youtube]6T4OhqkX2Mg[/youtube]
[color=orange][size=3pt]New Full Version:[/size][/color]


My [url=http://pastebin.com/VUGp4pC1]Load Order[/url]

[b][u][size=4][color=orange]
1.Requirements
2.Installation/Deinstallation Guide
3.Optional Section:

-Recommended Mods for Graphic and Atmosphere
-Recommended Mods for Gameplay and Immersion

4.Performance Tips and Z-Fighting Guide[/color][/size][/u][/b]



[font=impact][color=orange][size=7pt][u][b]1. Requirements:[/b][/size]

[size=3pt]for Ewi65 ini.files:[/u][/size][/color][/font]
[img]http://s1.directupload.net/images/user/130725/nc54uzzl.jpg[/img]
[color=red](Highly Recommended to get the mass Performance Boost)[/color]

[size=3][font=impact]Quad-Core Processor>2,5 ghz
8GB DDR3 RAM
2GB VRAM (Graphic card)[/font][/size]

[color=red]Don´t forget to change your Language and your Graphic card in the inis![/color]

[font=impact][color=orange][size=7pt][b][u]2. Installation Guide:[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font]

1. Download the files from Boris Vorontsov,here: [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0229.htm]ENB[/url]
The Download - Button is at the top, left. Inside this folder you pick the d3d9.dll, as well as enbhost.exe from wrapper version folder, and put it into your Skyrim directory, too. Press ok to overwrite if necessary.

2. Change this Values in your SkyrimPrefs.ini
(usually found in c:/users/current user/my games/skyrim):

bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
fGamma=1.2800
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=5 (when using "Ultra" shadows)
[color=red](This is already done in Ewi`s ini files)[/color]

3. Disable AA/SSAO/FXAA and Hi-Res Texture Packs in your Skyrim Launcher and your video driver settings.

[color=orange]4. (Optional): Download Recommended Textures[/color]

5. Install Mindflux Particle Patch for ENB (do this after Installation of all your Textures, and let it overwrite)

6. Finally Download my ENB, and unzip it into your Skyrim directory.

7. Finish!


[font=impact][color=orange][size=5pt][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/size][/color][/font]

Delete the following files from your Skyrim folder:

-enbseries folder
-data/shaders folder
-d3d9.dll
-all files with enb
-common.fxh and technique.fxh

...Finish!


[font=impact][color=orange][size=7pt][b][u]3. Optional Section:[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font]
[color=red][font=impact][size=3pt][u](All my Mod - Suggestions are 100% compatible!)[/u][/size][/font][/color]



[color=orange][font=impact][size=5pt][u]Recommended Mods:[/u][/size][/font][/color]

If you want exacly the same look as in my screenshots, you should have a look on these mods:
[color=red](Install them in descending order, and let always overwrite when asked, in order to get the right textures!)
[size=6pt][b]READ THE READMES ALWAYS![/b][/size][/color][/center]

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20801/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D20801%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Texture Pack Combiner[/url]-install complete with Paralaxtextures and Bryce Nebula Sky, but without W.A.T.E.R. if you want to use Pure Waters
[color=orange](Follow his Instructions step- by-step. It will be work to read it and get all this mods, however I can only Recommend it for EVERY Skyrim-Player.
This is the mod that will change nearly your whole skyrim from ugly to beautiful, as it will combine textures from nearly 70 different Mods!)[/color]
[color=red]Alternatively, if you don`t wanna have so much work, go to his Page, where Links to Textures are written, and install only those you want. StaticMeshImprovementMod, HD2K, Bellyache Creature Pack, Skyrim Flora Overhaul, Skyrim Ultra HD, Enhanced Distant Terrain and all Project Parallax files are absolute must haves![/color]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356//?]XCE - Xenius Charakter Enhancement[/url]- It will give you more possibilities to create your character, and will serve as basis
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28879//?]MacKorms Real Skin for Men[/url]- Let look all Mens in game natural.(looks more natural for me than Hi-res face maps for Men)
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30181/?]Alt Navetsea UNP Seamless[/url]- Complete Beauty Package for all womens in Skyrim
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722//?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]- More and better Eyes for your character (and all npcs)
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36510//?]Superior Lore Friendly Hair-HD Textures[/url]- Retextures all Hairs in Skyrim to HD Quality. Install the Main file with straight less saturated hair
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909//?]aMedianBorn Book of Silence[/url]- Select All aMedianBorn Downloads. Retexture for all Weapons, Creatures and Armors in Skyrim.
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30620//?]Bloody Dragon Bones[/url]- Hi-Res Textures for Dragon Bones. Take the 4k resolution.
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19826//?]Elaborate Textiles[/url]- Great Clothing Retexture for whole Skyrim
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4955//?]83Willows 101 Bugs HD[/url]- Will add more Fire- and Butterflies for Skyrim, in HD Quality
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28642//?]Ultimate HD Fire Effects[/url]- Most Realistic Fire Effects for Skyrim. Take the Medium Solution, as the difference between medium and Ultra is not noticable, but the Performance Impact is! [color=red]Install after Particle Patch for ENB![/color]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941/? tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D5941%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Coverkhajits[/url]
-Retexture for Khajits
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33582/?]Grass on Steroids[/url]- Take the Regular Edition for SFO
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D17802%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Climates of Tamriel[/url]- install all on default, except Night Levels, set this to lvl. 4 or 5
(Dont forget to load Dawnguard and Dragonborn content too, if you´ve installed it) I recommend to load the sound-addon too.
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39799/?]Climates of Tamriel- Fog Rain Overcast[/url]- Let look Skyrim even better. Take the first version
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40564//?]Skyfalls and Skymills[/url]
-Use in Conjunction with his optional New LODs File and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30026//?]Windmills Resized[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39394/?]Enhanced Distant Terrain 2[/url]
-The Distance from Skyrim will look a lot better
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25300/?]Distant Detail - Hearthfire Edition[/url] - Makes the Distance even more look awesome. There is a file for no Hearthfire users, too
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url]- Makes Skyrim Water Real!
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31686/?]Waves[/url]- Adds waves to some coasts
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043//?]ELFX - Enhanced Lights and Fx[/url]
-Follow the installer, [color=red]take the Main and Interior basic modules[/color] + What you need for other installed mods
(Dont forget to load ELFX Dawnguard too, if you´re using it)




[center][font=impact][color=orange][size=5pt][b][u]Optional Mods to increase Realism and Atmosphere:[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font]


[font=impact]
[size=5][u][color=orange]Graphic/Atmospheric related Mods:[/color][/u][/size][/font][/center]

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/60//?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url]- More Blood for your Game!
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23600//?]Player Headtracking[/url]- Makes the Player much more livelier. He will now change his mimik depending on situation, and move his head
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15506//?]Lightning during Thunder Storms[/url]- Adds Great Lightning Strikes in bad weather
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37873//?]Splash of Rain[/url]- You`ll hear it rain in Interiors, and see splashes on the ground outside.
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25666//?]Rainbows[/url]- Adds Rainbows to the game.
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25022//?]Shooting Stars[/url]- Adds Shooting stars and Meteorites in Night
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27563//?]Wet and Cold[/url]- Adds different weather-dependent Animations to the game. Example: Rain on your character, Steam out of the mouth from each Person in cold weathers,etc...
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19660/?]Get Snowy[/url]- Adds Snow Animation on all living things (includes character too)
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22745/?]Footprints[/url]- Adds Footprints to everything
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30533/?]Face to Face Conversation[/url]- Makes talking much livelier
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9843/?]Beautiful Cities[/url]- [color=red]or[/color] Towns and Villages Enhanced(Link not available, get it from Steam Workshop. There are more files than one. Drops FPS, but let the Cities look AWESOME.

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10886/?]Sounds of Skyrim - The Wilds[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20193/?]Sounds of Skyrim - Civilization[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8601/?]Sounds of Skyrim - The Dungeons[/url]
These three files will make your Skyrim much more livelier, through adding hundreds of sounds

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23771//?]Skybirds - Airborne Perching Birds[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17723//?]Birds of Skyrim[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11555//?]Birds and Flocks[/url]
-The last three ones should be used together, as they`ll add more birds, more sounds

[center][size=6pt][color=red]If you want just Graphics, you are finish now and ready to follow Installation Instructions. If you want to immerse your Gameplay Reality too, have a look at the following mods below.[/color][/size]



[font=impact][size=5][u][color=orange]Functional Mods (not graphic Related, get these Mods for Ultimate Real Gameplay)[/color][/u][/size][/font][/center]

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19281//?]Requiem - The Roleplaying Overhaul[/url]- A massive Overhaul for the whole game, will increase reality and difficulty of the game in each point
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26228//?]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/url]- Adds a system of basic needs to the game, like hunger,thirst and tireness
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163//?]Frostfall[/url]- Adds a survival system to the game. Player must now protect hisself against cold and wetness. Fires and camping will help
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438//?]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches[/url]- Adds cool bags and Pouches to the game, to increase your weight limit logically
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35611//?]Immersive Beds[/url]- Adds sleeping Animations to the Player
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23390//?]Guard Dialogue Overhaul[/url]- Guards will now handle yourself on the basis of your rank and actions
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17416//?]Wearable Lanterns[/url]- Adds wearable lanterns to the game
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38529/?tab=1&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D38529%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Touring Carriages[/url]- Sit back and Enjoy the rides with your carriages. No more fast-travelling through carriages!
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30212//?]Achieve That[/url]- Adds usefull Rewards for all your actions to Skyrim
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12977//?]Immersive Patrols[/url]- Adds more Live through NPCs to your Game
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30947/?]Dead Body Collision Fix[/url]- Fixes running through dead enemies, and makes them static.
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33201//?]Hunterborn[/url]- Immerse whole Hunting feeling.
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29476/?]Pumping Iron[/url]- Will letting grow your muscles within time and actions
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10175/?]Skytest - Realistic Animals and Predators[/url] - Makes Skyrims Animals a lot more intelligent, and let them behave like real animals


[center][size=5][u][font=impact][color=orange]Mods for a much better Interface:[/color][/font][/u][/size][/center]

-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863//?]SkyUI[/url]- a MUST HAVE for modders. Better menus + Possibility for a Menu to your mod.
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3222//?]Immersive HUD[/url]- Hide your HUDs if not needed during this moment
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4929//?]A Quality World Map[/url]- Much Better World Map
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12625//?]No Boring Sleep-Wait Menu[/url]- Much better Sleep-and wait menu
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/98//?]KenMod - Time on Loading Screen[/url]- Real-Time showing between loading screens.


[center][size=5][u][font=impact][color=orange]HIGHLY Recommended Patches[/color][/font][/u][/size][/center]


-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19//?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]- Patches lots of bugs in Skyrim
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23491//?]Unofficial Dawnguard Patch[/url]- Patches lots of bugs in Skyrim DLC Dawnguard
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25127//?]Unofficial Hearthfire Patch[/url]- Patches lots of bugs in Skyrim DLC Hearthfire
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31083//?]Unofficial Dragonborn Patch[/url]- Patches lots of bugs in Skyrim DLC Dragonborn
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24020//?]Brawl Bugs Patch[/url]- Patches lots of bugs in Skyrim, caused through mods
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33526/?]ShowRaceMenuPrecacheKiller[/url]- If you have much character Textures installed, it can happen that your game will crash. This Patch will prevent you therefore

[color=red]After all this, let [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6/?]BOSS[/url] sort your mods, or you could crash![/color]



[center][color=orange][font=impact][size=7pt][b][u]4. Performance Tips and Z-Fighting Guide:[/u][/b][/size][/font][/color]

Here are some Tweaks to increase your Performance and Possibilities to get rid of Z-Fighting.
What is Z-Fighting?--->[url= http://forum.step-project.com/showthread.php?tid=251]Tutorial[/url]

[color=orange][font=impact][size=5pt][b][u]Increasing Performance[/u][/b][/size][/font][/color]

1. Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13529//?]SMCO[/url], to reduce the size of your Textures and BSA Files, not the Meshes!

2. If you have an Intel CPU, use this : [url=http://www.coderbag.com/Programming-C/Disable-CPU-Core-Parking-Utility]Unpark CPU[/url]

3. Use this: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9080/?]Bethesda Hi-Res DLC Optimized[/url]

4. Set the values, this [url=http://www.iparadigm.org/pages/pnenb/ENBoost.html]Tool[/url] will give you into enblocal.ini

[color=orange][font=impact][size=5pt][b][u]Z-Fighting Guide:[/u][/b][/size][/font][/color]

Set in your Skyrim./SkyrimPrefs.ini these values:
[color=red](already included in Ewi65 ini. files][/color]

In Skyrim.ini Add/Edit:

[BackgroundLoad]
bBackgroundLoadLipFiles=1
bLoadBackgroundFaceGen=1
bUseMultiThreadedFaceGen=1
bBackgroundCellLoads=1
bLoadHelmetsInBackground=1
bUseMultiThreadedTrees=1
bUseBackgroundFileLoader=1

[Animation]
bMultiThreadBoneUpdate=1

[HAVOK]
iNumThreads=XX <---Here the number of your Processor Cores

[General]
bUseThreadedTempEffects=1
bUseThreadedParticleSystem=1
bMultiThreadMovement=1
bUseThreadedMorpher=1

[Decals]
bDecalMultithreaded=1

[Papyrus]
fUpdateBudgetMS=800
fExtraTaskletBudgetMS=800
fPostLoadUpdateTimeMS=2000
iMinMemoryPageSize=256
iMaxMemoryPageSize=512
iMaxAllocatedMemoryBytes=76800

In SkyrimPrefs.ini Add/Edit:

[Display]
iShadowMapResolutionSecondary=1024
iShadowMapResolutionPrimary=2048
iShadowMapResolution=2048

[Navmesh]
bUseThreadedMeshes=1

[Trees]
bUseMultiThreadedTrees=1
bShadowMaskZPrePass=1

[BackgroundLoad]
bBackgroundLoadLipFiles=1
bLoadBackgroundFaceGen=1
bUseMultiThreadedFaceGen=1
bBackgroundCellLoads=1
bLoadHelmetsInBackground=1
bUseMultiThreadedTrees=1

[General]
bUseThreadedParticleSystem=1
bUseThreadedBlood=1
bUseThreadedMorpher=1
bUseThreadedTempEffects=1
bUseThreadedTextures=1
bUseThreadedMeshes=1
bUseThreadedLOD=1
bUseThreadedAI=1
bUseThreadedMorpher=1

[Decals]
bDecalMultithreaded=1

(source: Skyrim Tweak Guide 2.2)

And thats how you could lessen the z - fighting:

Open your Skyrim/Prefs.ini files, and edit/add the following values

SkyrimPrefs.ini:

[TerrainManager]
fTreeLoadDistance=75000.0000
fBlockMaximumDistance=500000.0000
fBlockLevel1Distance=1400000.0000
fBlockLevel0Distance=75000.0000
fSplitDistanceMult=4.0000
bShowLODInEditor=0

Now search for "fSkyCellRefFadeDistance" and change it's value to 500000.0000
Save and exit.

Skyrim.ini:

[Display]
fNearDistance=25.0000


[color=orange][size=3pt]Now enjoy your Real Skyrim![/size][/color]



[font=impact][color=orange][size=4pt][u]Credits:[/u]
Boris Vorontsov - For giving us the chance to create wonderful graphics
Ewi65 - For having the Patience to help me with many questions and Finetuning this ENB, and of course his DoF and inis
CeeJay - For creating the awesome SweetFx Presets
mindflux and artem1s - for the Particle Patch and the Dark Dungeons
emd - for the Green Grass for ENB
ChaotiKPranXter, --JawZ-- , Lifeshield, Aiyen , Nexstac - For creating a detailed Tutorial how to create an ENB - You saved me a lot of time and trouble, guys
Bethesda Studios - For Creating great Games
And all modders, which make Skyrim 1000 times better[/size][/color][/font][/center]
author: Mangekyoumadara1987
